settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
settings.profile.description: Update your profile information and how others see you on the platform
settings.password.description: Change your password and manage your security settings
settings.preferences.description: Customize your experience and set your default preferences
settings.notifications.description: Choose what notifications you receive and how you receive them
settings.currency.description: Set your preferred currency and format for financial data
settings.theme.description: Customize the appearance of your application
settings.language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface
settings.account.description: Manage your account settings and connected services
settings.connectedServicesDescription: Connect third-party services to enhance your experience
